member.name: M:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.MarkupExtensions.CompiledBindingExtension.CreateObservableForTreeDataTemplate(System.Object)
member.summary: Hack for TreeDataTemplate to create a binding expression for an item.
member.remarks: Ideally we'd do this in a more generic way but didn't have time to refactor ITreeDataTemplate in time for 11.0. We should revisit this in 12.0.

member.name: T:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.MarkupExtensions.OnFormFactorExtensionBase`2
member.summary: Provides form factor-specific value for T for the current target device. This extension defines "form-factor" as a "device type" rather than "screen type".

member.name: P:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.MarkupExtensions.OnFormFactorExtensionBase`2.Default
member.summary: Gets or sets the value applied by default. If not set, default(TReturn) is assigned to the value.

member.name: P:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.MarkupExtensions.OnFormFactorExtensionBase`2.Desktop
member.summary: Gets or sets the value applied on desktop systems.

member.name: P:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.MarkupExtensions.OnFormFactorExtensionBase`2.Mobile
member.summary: Gets or sets the value applied on mobile systems.

member.name: P:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.MarkupExtensions.OnFormFactorExtensionBase`2.TV
member.summary: Gets or sets the value applied on TV systems.

member.name: P:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.RuntimeXamlLoaderConfiguration.LocalAssembly
member.summary: Default assembly for clr-namespace:.

member.name: P:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.RuntimeXamlLoaderConfiguration.UseCompiledBindingsByDefault
member.summary: Defines is CompiledBinding should be used by default. Default is 'false'.

member.name: P:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.RuntimeXamlLoaderConfiguration.DesignMode
member.summary: Indicates whether the XAML is being loaded in design mode. Default is 'false'.

member.name: P:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.RuntimeXamlLoaderConfiguration.DiagnosticHandler
member.summary: XAML diagnostics handler.
member.returns: Defines if any diagnostic severity should be overriden. Note, severity cannot be set lower than minimal for specific diagnostic.

member.name: T:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.RuntimeXamlLoaderConfiguration.XamlDiagnosticFunc
member.summary: Delegate for property.

member.name: F:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.RuntimeXamlDiagnosticSeverity.Info
member.summary: Something that is an issue, as determined by some authority, but is not surfaced through normal means. There may be different mechanisms that act on these issues.

member.name: F:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.RuntimeXamlDiagnosticSeverity.Warning
member.summary: Diagnostic is reported as a warning.

member.name: F:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.RuntimeXamlDiagnosticSeverity.Error
member.summary: Diagnostic is reported as an error. Compilation process is continued until the end of the parsing and transforming stage, throwing an aggregated exception of all errors.

member.name: F:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.RuntimeXamlDiagnosticSeverity.Fatal
member.summary: Diagnostic is reported as an fatal error. Compilation process is stopped right after this error.

member.name: P:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.RuntimeXamlLoaderDocument.BaseUri
member.summary: The URI of the XAML being loaded.

member.name: P:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.RuntimeXamlLoaderDocument.RootInstance
member.summary: The optional instance into which the XAML should be loaded.

member.name: P:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.RuntimeXamlLoaderDocument.XamlStream
member.summary: The stream containing the XAML.

member.name: P:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.RuntimeXamlLoaderDocument.ServiceProvider
member.summary: Parent's service provider to pass to the Build method or type ctor, if available.

member.name: T:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.Styling.MergeResourceInclude
member.summary: Loads a resource dictionary from a specified URL.
member.remarks: If used from the XAML code, it is merged into the parent dictionary in the compile time. When used in runtime, this type behaves like .

member.name: T:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.Styling.ResourceInclude
member.summary: Loads a resource dictionary from a specified URL.
member.remarks: If used from the XAML code, it is replaced with direct resource dictionary reference. When used in runtime, this type might be unsafe with trimming and AOT.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.Styling.ResourceInclude.#ctor(System.Uri)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The base URL for the XAML context.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.Styling.ResourceInclude.#ctor(System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.Styling.ResourceInclude.Loaded
member.summary: Gets the loaded resource dictionary.

member.name: P:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.Styling.ResourceInclude.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the source URL.

member.name: T:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.Styling.StyleInclude
member.summary: Includes a style from a URL.
member.remarks: If used from the XAML code, it is replaced with direct style reference. When used in runtime, this type might be unsafe with trimming and AOT.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.Styling.StyleInclude.#ctor(System.Uri)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The base URL for the XAML context.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.Styling.StyleInclude.#ctor(System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.Styling.StyleInclude.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the source URL.

member.name: P:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.Styling.StyleInclude.Loaded
member.summary: Gets the loaded style.

member.name: T:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.XamlIl.Runtime.IAvaloniaXamlIlParentStackProvider
member.summary: Provides the parents for the current XAML node in a lazy way.
member.remarks: This interface is used by the XAML compiler and shouldn't be implemented in your code.

member.name: P:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.XamlIl.Runtime.IAvaloniaXamlIlParentStackProvider.Parents
member.summary: Gets an enumerator iterating over the available parents in the whole hierarchy. The parents are returned in normal order: the first element is the most direct parent while the last element is the most distant ancestor.

member.name: T:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.XamlIl.Runtime.IAvaloniaXamlIlEagerParentStackProvider
member.summary: Provides the parents for the current XAML node in an eager way, avoiding allocations when possible.
member.remarks: This interface is used by the XAML compiler and shouldn't be implemented in your code.

member.name: P:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.XamlIl.Runtime.IAvaloniaXamlIlEagerParentStackProvider.DirectParentsStack
member.summary: Gets the directly available parents (which don't include ones returned by parent providers). The parents are returned in reverse order: the last element is the most direct parent while the first element is the most distant ancestor.

member.name: P:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.XamlIl.Runtime.IAvaloniaXamlIlEagerParentStackProvider.ParentProvider
member.summary: Gets the parent , if available.

member.name: T:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.XamlIl.Runtime.XamlIlParentStackProviderWrapper
member.summary: Wraps a into a , for backwards compatibility.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.XamlIl.Runtime.XamlIlRuntimeHelpers.AsEagerParentStackProvider(Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.XamlIl.Runtime.IAvaloniaXamlIlParentStackProvider)
member.summary: Converts a into a .

member.name: P:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.IRootObjectProvider.RootObject
member.summary: The root object of the xaml file

member.name: P:Avalonia.Markup.Xaml.IRootObjectProvider.IntermediateRootObject
member.summary: The "current" root object, contains either the root of the xaml file or the root object of the control/data template
